Question.Subject: Accessing Youtube with the Firefox browser Question?
Question.Content:
Hi..... I normally use Firefox and normally have no problem accessing Youtube. However, for the first time, today, I have got this pop-up screen: "Opening watch", file watch:
which is a : application/octet-stream from: http://www.youtube.com
It asks: What should Firefox do with this file? Open with Save File
I have never had this problem before!! Can anyone explain this and how to fix this situation. Thank you. Salaams. Thanks Bill :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You got a malicious cookie. I had the same thing.octet-stream
I had to clean my system>Un-tick accept third party cookies only in Tools/Privacy and ad these ad-dons to firefox: Add blocker/Script blocker and Flash blocker t make it more secure.
Follow the instructions and use the addons.
Maintaining your computer 1. Left click on C drive> properties/run windows disc cleaner 2. Download Ccleaner from here: http://www.filehippo.com/ 3. Install Ccleaner and run the cleaner top left, then run the registry cleaner below it on the left. you don’t need to backup the registry 4. Left click on C drive> properties>Tools>disc scanner or in the case of Vista it’s called something else, but it’s the top tab you click on> Prompt the scanner to scan upon next reboot and REBOOT COMPUTER) #(Prepare to wait up to an hour)# 5. After Disk scan/Disk check has finished run windows Disc Cleaner again, Ccleaner again and registry cleaner again. 6. Then you must do a DEFRAGMENTAION of C drive which is START>ALL PROGRAMS>ACCESSORIES>TOOLS>DEFRAGMENTATION. Additional options: You can also run adware 2008: http://www.lavasoft.com/single/trialpay.php AVG Anti-virus: http://free.avg.com/download Download and install this browser: http://www.mozilla-europe.org/en/firefox/ Flash blocker https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/433 Script blocker https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/722 supper add blocker plus. https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865 This is the flash player for fire fox https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/browse/type:7
